trans-unit.source: Defines the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Definerer relasjonen mellom et dataelement og noden den er binding til i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde der hver dataelement inneholder flere felt (for eksempel en XML-element med flere attributter) viser en node verdien som returneres av den `ToString` metode for dataelement som standard.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en XML-elementet viser noden elementnavnet, som viser underliggende strukturen i treet, men er nyttig hvis.

trans-unit.source: You can bind the properties of a node to a specific field by specifying tree node bindings.
trans-unit.target: Du kan binde egenskaper for en node til et bestemt felt ved å angi tre noden bindinger.

trans-unit.source: A TreeNodeBinding object defines the relationship between each data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for TreeNodeBinding definerer relasjonen mellom hver dataelement og noden som den er binding til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control stores its TreeNodeBinding objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the tree hierarchy and the data source hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll lagrer TreeNodeBinding objektene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>egenskapen og gjelder bindingene datakilden til å opprette en relasjon mellom trehierarkiet og datakilde hierarkiet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For each data item in the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control attempts to match the data item to a TreeNodeBinding object in order to create the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: For hver dataelementet i datakilden, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen forsøk på å sammenligne dataelementet til et TreeNodeBinding-objekt for å opprette den tilsvarende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When creating a TreeNodeBinding object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter et TreeNodeBinding-objekt, må du angi kriterier for bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: Vilkåret angir når et dataelement må være bundet til en node.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>egenskapen, eller begge egenskapene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.
trans-unit.target: Det er en liten ytelse økning ved å angi begge.

trans-unit.source: A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound.
trans-unit.target: Noden dybden angir noden som henter bundet.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following TreeNodeBinding declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ``` A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel følgende TreeNodeBinding deklarasjon binding den `Name` og `ID` felt av datakilden til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis for alle noder med dybden 0: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ``` datamedlem angir dataelementet i den underliggende datakilden, men kan representere ulike opplysninger avhengig av datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName> interface) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: Hver dataelement i en hierarkisk datakilde (representert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet) viser en <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap, som angir hvilken type dataelementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel navnet datamedlemmet for en XML-elementet på elementet.

trans-unit.source: When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use.
trans-unit.target: Når en datakilde inneholder flere datatyper for elementet, datamedlemmet angir hvilke data elementtype skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The following TreeNodeBinding declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ``` Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: Følgende TreeNodeBinding deklarasjon binding av `<Book>` elementer i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>kontrollen alle nodene i treet, uavhengig av plassering i hierarkiet: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ``` når bindingen kriteriene er opprettet, kan du deretter binde en egenskap for et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt som kan være bundet til en verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan binde til et felt eller et dataelement eller til en statisk verdi.

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the TreeNodeBinding object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: Når bundet til en statisk verdi alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som er brukt TreeNodeBinding-objektet ha samme verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override a bound property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object by setting the corresponding property directly in the node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan velge å overstyre en bundet egenskap i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet ved å angi den tilsvarende egenskapen direkte i noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties of the TreeNodeBinding class that allow you to bind a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data item.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskaper for klassen TreeNodeBinding som gjør det mulig å binde en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt til et felt eller et dataelement.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBinding-objekt som definerer og samsvarer med både dybden og datamedlem.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding object that defines and matches the data member only.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBinding-objekt som definerer og samsvarer med datamedlemmet.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding object that defines and matches the depth only.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBinding-objekt som definerer og samsvarer med dybden bare.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding object that defines neither the depth nor the data member.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBinding-objekt som definerer verken dybden eller datamedlemmet.

trans-unit.source: (This type of tree node binding is applied to all nodes in the tree.) 5.
trans-unit.target: (Denne typen tre noden binding brukes på alle nodene i treet.) 5.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding object that does not have a match in the data source.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBinding-objekt som ikke har en samsvarende i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item is then bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of the nodes to which the TreeNodeBinding object is applied.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet verdien som returneres av den `ToString` metode for dataelementet deretter bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>Egenskaper for noder som TreeNodeBinding-objektet er brukt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding class also allows you to format the text that is displayed in a node by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Klassen TreeNodeBinding muligheten til å formatere tekst som vises i en node ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use the TreeNodeBinding constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren TreeNodeBinding til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: It is often used when dynamically populating the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Det brukes ofte når dynamisk utfylling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>samling av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value to match against a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for a data item to determine whether to apply the tree node binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien til samsvar mot en <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> -egenskapen for et dataelement å finne ut om du vil bruke tre noden bindingen.

trans-unit.source: A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: En datamedlemmet angir dataelementet i den underliggende datakilden, men kan representere ulike opplysninger avhengig av datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName> object) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: Hver dataelement i en hierarkisk datakilde (representert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName>objektet) viser en <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap, som angir hvilken type dataelementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel navnet datamedlemmet for en XML-elementet på elementet.

trans-unit.source: When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use.
trans-unit.target: Når en datakilde inneholder flere datatyper for elementet, datamedlemmet angir hvilke data elementtype skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ``` When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>deklarasjon av bindinger i `<Book>` elementer i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>kontrollen alle nodene i treet, uavhengig av plassering i hierarkiet: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ``` når du oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet, må du angi kriterier for bindingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: Vilkåret angir når et dataelement må være bundet til en node.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or DataMember property, or both properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>eller DataMember egenskapen, eller begge egenskapene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.
trans-unit.target: Det er en liten ytelse økning ved å angi begge.

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: Når bindingen kriteriene er opprettet, kan du deretter binde en egenskap for et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt som kan være bundet til en verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan binde til et felt eller et dataelement eller til en statisk verdi.

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: Når bundet til en statisk verdi alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>brukes objektet ha samme verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value to match against a data item's <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether to apply the tree node binding.
trans-unit.target: Verdien til samsvar mot et dataelement <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> til å fastslå om du vil bruke tre noden bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the DataMember property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at egenskapen DataMember ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the node depth at which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir dybden for noden som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound.
trans-unit.target: Noden dybden angir noden som henter bundet.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ``` When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>deklarasjon av bindinger i `Name` og `ID` feltene for datakilden som skal den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis for alle noder med dybden 0: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ``` når du oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet, må du angi kriterier for bindingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: Vilkåret angir når et dataelement må være bundet til en node.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the Depth or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi dybden eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>egenskapen, eller begge egenskapene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.
trans-unit.target: Det er en liten ytelse økning ved å angi begge.

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: Når bindingen kriteriene er opprettet, kan du deretter binde en egenskap for et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt som kan være bundet til en verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan binde til et felt eller et dataelement eller til en statisk verdi.

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: Når bundet til en statisk verdi alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>brukes objektet ha samme verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The node depth at which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Nodedybden som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, indicating that the Depth property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som angir at egenskapen dybde ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir strengen som angir visningsformatet for teksten i en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: The FormatString property is used to provide a custom format for a node's text.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FormatString brukes til å angi et egendefinert format for en node tekst.

trans-unit.source: The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }.
trans-unit.target: Formatstrengen data består av to deler, atskilt av et kolon, i formatet { `A` : `Bxx` }.

trans-unit.source: For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel formatering strengen `{0:F2}` viser et faste punkt tall med to desimaler.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hele strengen må være angitt i parentesene til å angi at den er en formatstreng og ikke en strenglitteral.

trans-unit.source: Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: Tekst utenfor parentesene vises som litteral tekst.

trans-unit.source: The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for før kolon (`A` i eksemplet generelle) angir Parameterindeksen i en nullbasert liste over parametere.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne verdien kan angis bare for 0 fordi det bare er én verdi i hver node.

trans-unit.source: The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet etter kolon (`B` i eksemplet generelle) angir visningsformatet for verdien.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common formats.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser vanlige formater.

trans-unit.source: |Format character|Displays numeric values in| |----------------------|--------------------------------| |`C`|Currency format.| |`D`|Decimal format.| |`E`|Scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|Fixed format.| |`G`|General format.| |`N`|Number format.| |`X`|Hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > Except for `X`, the format character is not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: | Formater tegnet | Viser numeriske verdier i | |----------------------|--------------------------------| | `C`| Valutaformat. | | `D`| Desimalformat. | | `E`| Eksponentielt format (eksponentiell). | | `F`| Fast format. | | `G`| Generelt-formatet. | | `N`| Tallformat. | | `X`| Heksadesimalt format. | > [!NOTE] > Bortsett fra for `X`, format-tegn er bokstaver.

trans-unit.source: The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified.
trans-unit.target: Den `X` formattegn viser heksadesimale tegn i tilfelle som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: Verdien etter tegnet format (`xx` i eksemplet generelle) angir antall signifikante sifre eller desimaler som vises.

trans-unit.source: For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om formatering strenger, kan du se [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the FormatString property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen FormatString Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: En formatering streng som angir visningsformatet for teksten i en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the FormatString property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at egenskapen FormatString ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for verktøytipset for bildet som vises ved siden av en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ImageToolTip property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke egenskapen ImageToolTip under til å angi verdien som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: Teksten du angir gir hjelpefunksjoner enheter med en beskrivelse som kan brukes til å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When an image is displayed next to a node, the ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the image.
trans-unit.target: Når et bilde vises ved siden av en node, vises teksten for verktøytipset når musepekeren er plassert over bildet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the ImageToolTip property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan velge å overstyre egenskapen ImageToolTip under ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>for hver node direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the ImageToolTip property to bind the same ToolTip text to each node image, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke egenskapen ImageToolTip under å binde samme Verktøytipsteksten noden bildet, kan du binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>-objekt til et felt av en datakilde ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for verktøytipset for bildet som vises ved siden av en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på feltet fra datakilden som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip*>for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ImageToolTipField property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke egenskapen ImageToolTipField til å angi feltnavnet på skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: Teksten du angir gir hjelpefunksjoner enheter med en beskrivelse som kan brukes til å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When an image is displayed next to a node, the ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the image.
trans-unit.target: Når et bilde vises ved siden av en node, vises teksten for verktøytipset når musepekeren er plassert over bildet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the ImageToolTipField property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan velge å overstyre egenskapen ImageToolTipField ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>for hver node direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the ImageToolTipField property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke egenskapen ImageToolTipField til å binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt til et felt, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>til en fast verdi ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis datakilden inneholder flere felt, må du først angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>egenskapen, eller begge egenskapene for å bindes til det aktuelle feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip*>for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the ImageToolTipField property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at ImageToolTipField-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som vises ved siden av en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ImageUrl property to specify a custom image to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke egenskapen ImageUrl til å angi en egendefinert bildet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed next to a node and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: Bildet vises ved siden av en node, og kan være i alle filformater (JPG, GIF, BMP osv), så lenge klientleseren støtter dette formatet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can override the image for an individual node by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan overstyre bildet for en enkelt node ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>egenskapen direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to bind the same image to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for denne egenskapen til å binde samme bilde til hver enkelt node, kan du binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>-objekt til et felt av en datakilde ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When displaying an image next to a node with the ImageUrl property, you should also consider setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du viser et bilde ved siden av en node med egenskapen ImageUrl, må du også vurdere innstillingen det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: Verktøytipsteksten som du angir gir hjelpefunksjoner enheter med en beskrivelse som kan brukes til å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed next to a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et bilde som vises ved siden av en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: The ImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ImageUrl er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på feltet fra datakilden som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl*>for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ImageUrlField property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde, bruke egenskapen ImageUrlField til å angi navnet på feltet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed next to a node and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports the format.
trans-unit.target: Bildet vises ved siden av en node, og kan være i alle filformater (JPG, GIF, BMP osv), så lenge klientleseren støtter formatet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can override the image for an individual node by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan overstyre bildet for en enkelt node ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>egenskapen direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke denne egenskapen til å binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt til et felt, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>til en fast verdi ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis datakilden inneholder flere felt, må du først angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>egenskapen, eller begge egenskapene for å bindes til det aktuelle feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: When displaying an image next to a node with the ImageUrlField property, you should also consider setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du viser et bilde ved siden av en node med egenskapen ImageUrlField, må du også vurdere innstillingen det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: Verktøytipsteksten som du angir gir hjelpefunksjoner enheter med en beskrivelse som kan brukes til å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl*>for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the ImageUrlField property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at ImageUrlField-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to link to when a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen for å koble til når en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes klikkes.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the NavigateUrl property to specify the URL to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke egenskapen NavigateUrl til å angi URL-adressen skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a hyperlink for the text of the node, instead of plain text.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen viser en hyperkobling for teksten for noden for i stedet for ren tekst.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>til å angi vinduet eller rammen der du vil vise koblet innhold.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the NavigateUrl property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan velge å overstyre egenskapen NavigateUrl ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>for hver node direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the NavigateUrl property to bind the same URL to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke egenskapen NavigateUrl binde samme URL-adressen til hver enkelt node, kan du binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>-objekt til et felt av en datakilde ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.target: URL-adressen for å koble til når en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the NavigateUrl property is not set.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på feltet fra datakilden som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl*>for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the NavigateUrlField property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke egenskapen NavigateUrlField til å angi feltnavnet på skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When the NavigateUrlField property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a hyperlink for the text of the node, instead of plain text.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen NavigateUrlField angis, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen viser en hyperkobling for teksten for noden for i stedet for ren tekst.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>til å angi vinduet eller rammen der du vil vise koblet innhold.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the NavigateUrlField property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of each node directly.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the NavigateUrlField property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke egenskapen NavigateUrlField til å binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt til et felt, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>til en fast verdi ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis datakilden inneholder flere felt, må du først angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>egenskapen, eller begge egenskapene for å bindes til det aktuelle feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl*>for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the NavigateUrlField property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at NavigateUrlField-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied is populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om noden som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes fylles ut dynamisk.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: Det er noen ganger praktisk å forhåndsdefinere statisk trestrukturen på grunn av datastørrelsen eller innhold som er avhenger av brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: Derfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen støtter dynamiske noden populasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the PopulateOnDemand property is set to `true`, the child nodes of the node that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied to gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen PopulateOnDemand er satt til `true`, underordnede noder av noden som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes til henter utfylt ved kjøretid når noden utvides.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: When data bindings are created by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the PopulateOnDemand property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når dataene bindinger er opprettet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A>av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>styre til `true`, bindingene som opprettes har PopulateOnDemand satt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data bindings that are created declaratively have the PopulateOnDemand property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Databindinger som opprettes deklarativt har PopulateOnDemand satt `false`.

trans-unit.source: Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings.
trans-unit.target: Bruker syntaksen deklarerende, kan du kontrollere virkemåten for individuelle dataene bindinger.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> class, the PopulateOnDemand property does not require an event-handling method to be defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event, if you are using a data source control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I motsetning til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>klassen egenskapen PopulateOnDemand ikke krever en hendelseshåndtering metode som skal defineres for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>hendelsen hvis du bruker en kildekontroll for data, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control dynamically generates an event-handling method using the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: I stedet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen dynamisk genererer en hendelseshåndtering metoden ved hjelp av egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objekter i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can still define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event; however, it will be called after the event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fortsatt definere en hendelseshåndtering metode for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>hendelsen; imidlertid det skal kalles etter hendelseshåndtering metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>

trans-unit.source: Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: Støttede nettlesere kan også dra nytte av klientsiden noden populasjon.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, preventing the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når aktivert dette tillater at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen til å fylle en node dynamisk på klienten når den noden utvides, hindrer at du må legge inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon på klientsiden noden populasjonen, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event or events to raise when a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied is selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hendelsen eller hendelsene opphøye når en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> brukes objekt er valgt.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the SelectAction property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke egenskapen SelectAction til å angi verdien som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property is used to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>egenskapen brukes til å angi hvilken hendelsen eller hendelsene aktiveres når en node er valgt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the SelectAction property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan velge å overstyre egenskapen SelectAction ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>for hver node direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelige alternativer.

trans-unit.source: |`SelectAction` value|Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`|Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: | `SelectAction` verdien | Beskrivelse | |--------------------------|-----------------| | `TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`| Aktiverer/deaktiverer noden mellom utvidede og skjulte.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`|Raises no events when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`|Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`|Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>-hendelse eller hendelsen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>etter behov. | | `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`| Opphøyer ingen hendelser når en node er valgt. | | `TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`| Opphøyer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>-hendelse når en node er valgt. | | `TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`| Opphøyer både den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>hendelser når en node er valgt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: Noder bare utvides, skjules aldri. | > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>gjengis ikke for en node med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>-egenskapen satt til `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" name="TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" name="TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a check box is displayed next to a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en avmerkingsboks vises ved siden av en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: To provide multinode selection support in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, you can display check boxes next to an image in the node.
trans-unit.target: Angi multinode utvalget støtte i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen, kan du vise avmerkingsboksene ved siden av et bilde i noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ShowCheckBox property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke egenskapen verdien for ShowCheckBox til å angi verdien som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is used to show or hide the check box for a node.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>egenskapen brukes til å vise eller skjule merket for en node.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the ShowCheckBox property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om egenskapen verdien for ShowCheckBox kan brukes til å vise avmerkingsboksene, er det vanlige å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property affects every node type that is specified by the property; therefore, the ShowCheckBox property is often used to override that setting for a node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>påvirker hver nodetypen som er angitt av egenskapen; derfor egenskapen verdien for ShowCheckBox ofte brukes til å overstyre innstillingen for en node som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the ShowCheckBox property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: Du kan velge å overstyre egenskapen verdien for ShowCheckBox ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>for hver node direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ICloneable.Clone method is used primarily by control developers.

trans-unit.target: Laster inn tidligere lagret visningsstatusen for noden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved view state values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder verdiene lagrede visningen.

trans-unit.target: Lagrer visningen tilstandsendringer i et objekt.

trans-unit.target: Objektet som inneholder visningen tilstandsendringer.

trans-unit.target: Angir at det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objekt for å spore endringer i visningsstatusen.
