trans-unit.target: Etter metoden IStateManager.TrackViewState er kalt på en serverkontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is associated with a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir målvinduet eller rammen der du vil vise nettsiden innholdet som er knyttet til en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the Target property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke Target-egenskapen til å angi verdien som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>egenskapen brukes til å angi vinduet eller rammen som skal vises på nettet innhold som er koblet til en node når noden klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the Target property overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control for the nodes to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Innstillingen Target-egenskapen overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen for noder som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the Target property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: Du kan velge å overstyre Target-egenskapen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>for hver node direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Target property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Target-egenskapen blir gjengitt som et `target` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: Den `target` attributtet for `anchor` elementer er ikke tillatt i typedefinisjonen XHTML 1.1 dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Do not set the Target property, if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> control must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: Ikke angi egenskapen Target hvis den gjengitte utdata for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>kontrollen må være XHTML 1.1 samsvar.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [XHTML standarder i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > > When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the Target property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: >> Når du oppretter tilgjengelig nettsider, bør du ikke bruke Target-egenskapen til et nytt vindu som mål.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: ASP.NET tilgjengelighet](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae).

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.
trans-unit.target: Målvinduet eller rammen der du vil vise innholdet koblede websiden.

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Verdier må begynne med en bokstav i området for A til Z (bokstaver), bortsett fra bestemte spesielle verdier som begynner med et understrekingstegn som vises i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: Target value
trans-unit.target: Målverdien

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelse

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in a new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i et nytt vindu uten forhandleren.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i overordnet umiddelbar rammesett.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the search pane.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i ruten.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i rammen med fokus.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i hele vinduet uten forhandleren.

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref> value is supported.
trans-unit.target: Se i dokumentasjonen for nettleseren for å finne ut om den <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""> </xref> verdien støttes.

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5.0 and later supports the <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref> target value.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel Microsoft Internet Explorer versjon 5.0 og senere støtter den <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""> </xref> målverdi.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), som oppdaterer vinduet eller ramme med fokus.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på feltet fra datakilden som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target*>for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the TargetField property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke egenskapen TargetField til å angi feltnavnet på skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>egenskapen brukes til å angi vinduet eller rammen som skal vises på nettet innhold som er koblet til en node når noden klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the TargetField property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan velge å overstyre egenskapen TargetField ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>for hver node direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the TargetField property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke egenskapen TargetField til å binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt til et felt, kan du angi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>til en fast verdi ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis datakilden inneholder flere felt, må du først angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>egenskapen, eller begge egenskapene for å bindes til det aktuelle feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises for noden som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the Text property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke Text-egenskapen til å angi verdien som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property is used to specify the text displayed in a node.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>egenskapen brukes til å angi en tekst som vises i en node.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the Text property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan velge å overstyre Text-egenskapen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>for hver node direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the Text property to bind the same text to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TextField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for bruker Text-egenskapen til å binde samme tekst til hver enkelt node, kan du binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>-objekt til et felt av en datakilde ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TextField%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a displayed value that is not displayed but is used to store any additional data about a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied, such as data used for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en vist verdi som ikke vises, men brukes til å lagre ytterligere data om en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes, for eksempel data som brukes til å behandle sende tilbake hendelser.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the Value property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke Value-egenskapen til å angi verdien som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property is used to supplement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>egenskapen brukes i tillegg av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>ved lagring ytterligere data tilknyttet noden som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien vises ikke i kontrollen, og brukes vanligvis til å lagre data for håndtering av sende tilbake hendelser.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the Value property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan velge å overstyre Value-egenskapen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>for hver node direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the Value property to bind the same value to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for bruker Value-egenskapen til å binde samme verdi for hver node, kan du binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>-objekt til et felt av en datakilde ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Supplemental data about a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied; this data is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ekstra data om en node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes; disse dataene vises ikke.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på feltet fra datakilden som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value*>for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ValueField property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde ved å bruke egenskapen ValueField til å angi feltnavnet på skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingsrelasjonen innvirkning på alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property is used to supplement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>egenskapen brukes i tillegg av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>ved lagring ytterligere data tilknyttet noden som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien vises ikke i kontrollen, og brukes vanligvis til å lagre data for håndtering av sende tilbake hendelser.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the ValueField property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan velge å overstyre egenskapen ValueField ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>for hver node direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the ValueField property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to an field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke egenskapen ValueField til å binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekt til et felt du kan angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>til en fast verdi ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis datakilden inneholder flere felt, må du først angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>egenskapen, eller begge egenskapene for å bindes til det aktuelle feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value*>for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> objektet brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the ValueField property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at ValueField-egenskapen ikke er angitt.
